tool_description: Calculates mechanical royalties based on sales data, statutory rates, and licensing agreements.

catalog_number.description: Unique catalog identifier for the song

units_sold.description: Number of units sold (physical and digital)

license_type.description: Type of mechanical license (compulsory, negotiated, blanket)

negotiated_rate.description: Negotiated rate if different from statutory

error_messages: Invalid sales data: units_sold and streams must be non-negative integers.
Invalid statutory rate: Rate must be a positive number greater than zero.
Invalid calculation period: End date must be after start date with valid ISO 8601 format.
Unknown territory: Territory code must be valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
Invalid license type: Must be one of 'compulsory', 'negotiated', or 'blanket'.
Conflicting rates: When license_type is 'negotiated', negotiated_rate must be provided.
usage: Provide catalog_number, sales data (units_sold, streams), statutory_rate, territory, and calculation period. Optionally specify license_type and negotiated_rate for custom agreements.

effective_rate_used.description: The actual rate used in calculations

calculation_details.description: Summary of calculation methodology and inputs
